name: Feuer & Flamme - GGJ16 @ WERK1 Entry
description:
Feuer & Flamme was made during the Grill & Game Jam 2016 at WERK1 in 8 hours. Platform was Android but here is a HTML5 build to play in your browser! APK file also available!

Controls:

Click on "Tap to Start" to start.

Use Arrow Keys to navigate the bin.

Credits:
